InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-322 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 2xS2

Behring’s MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Dominator II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Talon
Tracking Signal: Electromagnetic
Size: 2

Designed to track an opponent’s electromagnetic signature, the Dominator strike missile is a precision ordnance package designed to establish tactical battlefield dominance.

InstalledItem.Name: Dominator II Missile

Behring’s MSD-221 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 2 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S1 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Marksman I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 1

Behring's Marksman series of proximity missiles has earned as much of a reputation for its ability to track a wide range of heat signatures as it has for its area-effect proximity damage.

InstalledItem.Name: WEB
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Seal Corporation
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Tried, tested, and refined for centuries, the WEB shield generator balances sleek design with stellar performance to keep your ship safe under a wide variety of circumstances.

InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd.
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The PowerBolt provides all the power and performance you need for your journey through the stars. You can trust Lightning Power to get you there.

InstalledItem.Name: ArcticStorm
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

If you’re after a cooler that balances performance, durability and stealth, then look to the ArcticStorm. This mid-grade cooler from Lightning Power Ltd uses their centuries old technology to provide performance that can be relied upon.
